original_title: Sid Waddell's Wacky World of Darts
overview: Over the 21 years Sid Waddell has been commentating on this terrific sport, he has seen all the greatest matches, met the most amazing characters, and witnessed some unbelievable scenes. This movie is his ultimate collection of these hugely enjoyable moments, and makes for great family entertaiment.
tagline: Waddel's brash idiosyncratic commentaries have made him a cult figure
title: Sid Waddell's Wacky World of Darts
